doc:data.doc:body:
{$appName}
I'm an experienced web developer with various overlaps. I like solutions
with minimal dependencies and with focus on performance and longevity.
I don't surf on dev fashion and carefully consider my decisions and time.
I create information systems, ecommerce applications, open source components
and sometimes I make some training for professional programmers.
I work both alone and in a team and I have experience in managing developers.
You can find out everything about me in resume..
{hr()}
Services
Web and Desktop Development
Custom development of information systems or adapting market solutions.
Development in languages JS, TypeScript, PHP, C#, VB.NET.
Development and administration of MariaDB and Microsoft SQL Server databases.
IT Project Supervision
I will help you understand the processes in the development team and set up the right procedures.
I will ensure your developers deliver what you are paying for.
Server Administration
I can assist you with server administration on Linux or Windows.
I will provide server monitoring and reporting.
I will ensure Long Term Support for your applications.
Graphic Design
I will prepare webdesign/redesign for your project.
I will prepare print or online advertising materials for you.
I will help you with post-production of photos or advertising spots.
If you are looking for precise work and a partner focused on your project, feel free to contact me.
{hr()}
Open Source projects
MvcCore
PHP framework for both single-file tools and complex systems.
Desharp
.NET debug utility for desktop and web applications.
Web Dev Server
Comfortable development in Node.JS with "hot reload" feature.
Ext.TS
Transpiler for Ext.JS documentation to TypeScript.
I try to make my code help others, check out all open source projects.
